mapper.sql: mpoi.id as id, mpoi.mbr_prod_order_id as mbr_prod_order_id, mpoi.winery_id as winery_id, mpoi.mbr_id as mbr_id, mpoi.prod_sku_id as prod_sku_id, mpoi.prod_sku_cnt as prod_sku_cnt, mpoi.sku_name as sku_name, mpoi.sku_market_price as sku_market_price, mpoi.sku_sell_price as sku_sell_price, mpoi.sku_mbr_price as sku_mbr_price, mpoi.is_integral as is_integral, mpoi.integral_amt as integral_amt, mpoi.integral_cnt as integral_cnt, mpoi.create_date as create_date, mpoi.modify_date as modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into m_mbr_prod_order_item (id, mbr_prod_order_id, winery_id, mbr_id, prod_sku_id, prod_sku_cnt, sku_name, sku_market_price, sku_sell_price, sku_mbr_price, is_integral, integral_amt, integral_cnt, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{mbrProdOrderId}, #{wineryId}, #{mbrId}, #{prodSkuId}, #{prodSkuCnt}, #{skuName}, #{skuMarketPrice}, #{skuSellPrice}, #{skuMbrPrice}, #{isIntegral}, #{integralAmt}, #{integralCnt}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_mbr_prod_order_item
mbr_prod_order_id = #{mbrProdOrderId},
winery_id = #{wineryId},
mbr_id = #{mbrId},
prod_sku_id = #{prodSkuId},
prod_sku_cnt = #{prodSkuCnt},
sku_name = #{skuName},
sku_market_price = #{skuMarketPrice},
sku_sell_price = #{skuSellPrice},
sku_mbr_price = #{skuMbrPrice},
is_integral = #{isIntegral},
integral_amt = #{integralAmt},
integral_cnt = #{integralCnt},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
